name: Murge
description:
I made this game for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

Music and sfx in this game:

Laser Cannon by Mike Koenig https://soundbible.com/1771-Laser-Cannon.html#  (modified by Oreo_man)
Glass Ping by Go445 https://soundbible.com/2084-Glass-Ping.html
Cinematic Electronic Track by Alexander Blu https://orangefreesounds.com/cinematic-electronic-track/
